title: Battleaxe Proficiency
content:
Battleaxe Proficiency Effect Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with battleaxes. Requirements Dwarf

Battleaxe Proficiency

Add your proficiency bonus to attack rolls (your chance to hit a target) with battleaxes.

Battleaxe Proficiency is a Feature in Baldur's Gate 3. Features provide unique abilities or effects and can be acquired depending on the Character's Race, Class and level.
